title: The One About the Internet
description:
This week on Sibling Rivalry Monét and Bob discuss all things the internet! Bob talks about a recent car crash, Monét prides themselves on knowing when the Victorian era was, and the two breakdown the dark web, AOL Chat Rooms, internet trolls, and the science of iPhone cameras.
Make the switch to PrettyLitter TODAY—it’s just good sense. Go to PrettyLitter.com and use promo code rivalry for 20% off your first order. 
MyFitnessPal does way more than count calories! For a limited time, they are offering listeners three months of their premium membership for free! Already a member? No problem. You still claim this offer! Get your Premium membership by going to rivalry.MYFITNESSPAL.com and use code rivalry to get three months for FREE!
Go right now to Truebill.com/RIVALRY - it could save you THOUSANDS a year.
Follow “Harsh Reality: The Story of Miriam Rivera” on Apple Podcasts, Amazon Music, or you can listen early and ad free by joining Wondery Plus in Apple Podcasts or the Wondery App. 
This holiday, give one annual membership and get one free! Go to MASTERCLASS.com/RIVALRY today.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
